nodes.text: Tarasinese was the native language of the Tarasin species native to the planet of Cularin. Tarasins had a rich oral tradition in Tarasinese. Most Tarasins were fluent in both Tarasinese and Basic, being literate in both languages.
Tarasin hunters were also fluent in Tarasin skintone language, a silent form of communication that was done by changing the color of their scales.
